wikipedia_page.main: Stephen Darrow Stacey (born 27 August 1944 in Bristol, England), is an English footballer who played as a full back in the Football League with Bristol City, Wrexham, Ipswich Town and Exeter City. He was the first footballer of African American heritage to play professionally in the United Kingdom.

response: * Steve Stacey (born 1958), Australian rugby league footballer
* Steve Stacey (born 1944), English association football player
Steve Stacey is an Australian former rugby league footballer who played in the 1980s.
Steve Stacey made only two appearances for Queensland, scoring a try in the 1983 series.
